name: Beer & Cheez Dip
description: A creamy and dreamy dip that puts a vegan spin on a pub classic. Completely nut free, too! It’s low in fat and carbs, so you can enjoy your favourite dippers guilt free. Our secret ingredient? Nutritional yeast. It gives the dip that cheesy, umami flavour you’re craving.

ingredients.name: beer
ingredients.additionalInstruction: such as brown ale or pale ale

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix or Herb & Garlic Dip Mix

preparation: Bring beer to a boil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Whisk in oat milk, dip mix, and mustard.
Reduce heat to medium; slowly whisk in seasoning. Simmer, whisking often, 12–15 min, or until thickened.
Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Dip will continue to thicken as it cools. Serve with tortilla chips, pita wedges, or chopped veggies for dunking.
tips: Different types of ale will bring a different taste to this dip. Try pale ale for a lighter, smoother flavour, or brown ale for a more robust and malty flavour!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.

products.name: Modern Mac Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Modern Mac is the best nut-and-dairy-free, vegan version of creamy mac & cheese out there! Free from gluten, dairy, nuts, soy, mustard, onion, garlic, and sugar, this seasoning makes a deliciously thick, velvety sauce with a touch of nooch (nutritional yeast). Make it your way with the milk and pasta of your choice and enjoy a tasty modern take on classic comfort food.
